body.p: For interest rate risk, the sensitivity analysis might show separately the effect of a change in market interest rates on:

li.p: other line items of profit or loss (such as trading gains and losses); and

body.p: An entity might disclose a sensitivity analysis for interest rate risk for each currency in which the entity has material exposures to interest rate risk.
